featured.text: The existing mountain roads were destroyed.
A. Amy Personally I’m against zoos, though I do understand some of the arguments why they should exist.
Our bodies have evolved to exist within Earth’s gravity (1 g), not in the weightlessness of space (0 g) or the microgravity of Mars (0.3 g).
Like it or not, zoos will continue to exist as long as there is a demand for them.

other.text: Although some things are , they nevertheless exist.
The visitors would be even more startled if they were fully aware of all the existing similarities between them and these animals.

definition.en_def: To have actual being; to be real or present.
definition.example: Many believe that life exists on other planets.
